TITLE: Minecraft
STORY: Based on the best-selling game of all time, 'MINECRAFT: The Movie' takes us to a world where imagination can achieve anything. Welcome to the world of Minecraft, where creativity not only helps you create, but is also vital to survival.

Four misfits - Garrett 'The Junkyard' Garrison, Henry, Natalie and Dawn - try to cope with their usual problems until one day they pass through a mysterious portal to the Overworld: a strange cubic universe beyond imagination.

To return home, they will have to master the intricacies of this world (and protect it from evil creatures) by embarking on a magical mission, together with expert inventor Steve. This adventure will challenge all five to be brave and will help them rediscover the unique creative abilities that set them apart from others - the most important quality they need to succeed in the real world.

TITLE: Sinners
STORY: Set in the 1920s and 1930s, Sinners tells the story of two twin �cousins� who return to their hometown in the American South.
They try to leave behind the difficult, troubled lives they have led until now, but encounter an even greater evil at home.

They try to leave behind the difficult, troubled lives they have led until now, but encounter an even greater evil at home.

TITLE: Mickey 17
STORY: From Oscar-winning director and screenwriter Bong Joon-ho of Parasite comes a new and shocking cinematic experience.
Mickey 17 tells the story of an unusual character, Mickey Barnes (Robert Pattinson), who finds himself in a rather unusual situation.
His employer demands his full commitment, including working him to the point of death.

TITLE: Snow White
STORY: Nearly 90 years after forever changing the world of cinema with their groundbreaking first feature-length animated film, Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs, Disney is revisiting the Brothers Grimm-inspired classic and bringing it to the big screen for a new generation in a stunning live-action version.
Starring young star Rachel Zegler as the 'fearless, kind, brave and honest' heroine, and the irresistible Wonder Woman Gal Gadot as the Evil Queen.

TITLE: Super Elfkins
STORY: For the cheerful and rebellious Elfie, life among humans is full of excitement and challenges. She uses every opportunity for fun while following her calling to help others. Elfie's world suddenly turns upside down when she meets Bo and his band of elves, who live for one purpose - to have fun.

Instead of being of service to humans, they use their skills and modern technology for extreme experiences on the edge of the law. They always narrowly escape the pursuit of the obsessed policewoman Lansky.
She is convinced of the existence of elves and their mischievous nature and makes great efforts to capture them and expose them to the world.
Will the two clans of elves overcome their differences and together keep the secret about the little people who live to help people, or will Policeman Lansky be proven right?

TITLE: Death Notice
STORY: In Death Note, Emmy nominee Megan Fahey (The White Lotus) stars as Violet, a widow and mother who finally decides to go on her first romantic date in years.
When she arrives at a fancy restaurant with a stunning view of the city, she discovers that she was worried about Henry, the man she is dating, is more attractive and charming than she expected.
The chemistry between the two is palpable, but the atmosphere is soon darkened when Violet receives a series of anonymous phone messages that seem like a bad joke, but soon turn into real terror.

The messages are categorical - she must follow the instructions she receives closely or the man she sees on the security cameras in her home will kill her young son and her sister. And the final order from her invisible tormentor? Violet must kill Henry.

TITLE: The worker
STORY: Jason Statham returns in a new action-packed thriller. From the director of Suicide Squad and The Beekeeper: Death Sentence, The Worker is a story that will shake you to your core and take you on a journey of a lifetime.

Leven Cade chooses to leave the Royal Marines in his past and begins a normal life as a construction worker. But when his boss's daughter is kidnapped, he embarks on a personal mission to bring her back home.
His search reaches deep into the dark underbelly of corruption and human trafficking, uncovering secrets beyond imagination.

TITLE: Flood
STORY: In a world without humans, a stubborn cat barely survives a major flood.

Aided by a sleepy capybara, a lemur obsessed with shiny objects, an overly friendly Labrador, and a giant crane-like bird, the unlikely menagerie has no choice but to stay together on a rickety boat while they navigate their strange and rapidly changing environment.

TITLE: The cruel road
STORY: 1984. In the shadow of the Iron Curtain, a nation dares to challenge the gods. On the occasion of the 40th anniversary of the socialist revolution, Bulgaria faces its best climbers in the face of the greatest test on the planet - the deadly Mount Chomolungma, known as Everest.
But this is not just a climb. Eighteen Bulgarians are preparing to conquer the peak along the Western Ridge - an ominous route that has earned the nickname 'The Cruel Road'.
A place where death lurks behind every rocky edge and where the human spirit faces the elements in their purest and most merciless form.
